biography: Bo is a builder of virtual replicas. As a Digital Twin Engineer, she creates high-fidelity simulations of real-world objects, systems, and processes. Her work allows Katje to test, predict, and optimize performance in a virtual environment before deploying in the physical world. She is meticulous, detail-oriented, and has an incredible ability to model complex systems, from a single robot arm to an entire supply chain.
